p: The effect of P. atlantica on inhibition of the mushroom tyrosinase in oxidation of L-DOPA was assessed. The results indicated that mushroom tyrosinase activity was inhibited by all different extracts, but the concentration of 1000 Î¼g/mL of n-hexane extract had no significant effect in this test. Kojic acid (2 and 4 mM) was used as positive control ( P < 0.05) ( Fig. 2).
